content: mini gnome crochet set pattern this set pattern includes 3 mini gnome patterns before you make a purchase please acknowledge that a this is an instant download pdf crochet pattern not the finished doll b my patterns are available in english c i will not refund the payment for pdf file if you change your mind you can find free pattern of 1 gnome the blue gnome in my youtube channel link https //www youtube com/watch v=d-crmwkkjnq&t=128s however if you want the whole set pattern with the pdf file for printing it s a good choice to buy them you will receive 3 patterns with many pictures and detail tutorial to make these gnomes thank you so much for your support skill level easy this pattern is very clear with so many photos and videos for the beginner finished size if crocheted with a 2 00 mm hook gnome should measure approximately 12 cm skills technic needed magic_ring crocheting in spiral single_crochet slip_stitch half-double_crochet and double_crochet stitches increase and decrease stitches color changing and ability to sew multiple pieces together however if you have any questions about this pattern please contact me i m very happy to help you languages this pattern is available in - english us terms materials crochet hook size 2 00 mm us b uk 14 yarnart jeans - gauge‎ ‎24 sts / 10 cm 4 and 30 row - weight‎ ‎sport / fine - fur yarn - bergere de france grizzly 100 color sable fiber filling can i sell finished dolls you may sell finished items made with this pattern in a limited number and provided you credit me as the original designer hope you enjoy making gnome
